text: And they sang one to another in praising and giving thanks unto Jehovah, <FI>saying<Fi> , For he is good, for his lovingkindness <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever toward Israel. And all the people shouted with a great shout, when they praised Jehovah, because the foundation of the house of Jehovah was laid.
name: Ezra 3:11
